{{cpp/io/basic_istream/title|tellg}}
{{cpp/io/basic_istream/navbar}}
{{ddcl|
pos_type tellg();
}}

Returns input position indicator of the current associated {{tt|streambuf}} object.

Behaves as {{named req|UnformattedInputFunction}}, except that {{lc|gcount()}} is not affected. After constructing and checking the sentry object, if {{c|1=fail() == true}}, returns {{c|pos_type(-1)}}. Otherwise, returns {{c|rdbuf()-&gt;pubseekoff(0, std::ios_base::cur, std::ios_base::in)}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
The current position of the get pointer on success, {{c|pos_type(-1)}} on failure.

===Exceptions===
{{include|cpp/io/stream_exceptions}}

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;sstream&gt;
#include &lt;string&gt;

int main()
{
    std::string str = "Hello, world";
    std::istringstream in(str);
    std::string word;
    in &gt;&gt; word;
    std::cout &lt;&lt; "After reading the word \"" &lt;&lt; word
              &lt;&lt; "\" tellg() returns " &lt;&lt; in.tellg() &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=
After reading the word "Hello," tellg() returns 6
}}
